summary: LOTR - Mines of Moria - entrance through Guldonrock/caven
descriptionHtml:
LOTR - Mines of Moria - entrance through Guldonrock/caven 
-The exit is located near Ivarstead
-THIS IS NOT A QUEST
-It is just an epic location and an awesome fight throughout

I recommend bringing a bow with you!

-Any ideas for another locations would be good, as well as feedback as this is my first mod

Install into /DATA in your skyrim folder (the usual way) and check the esp in the loader 

THE NEWEST VERSION !!!!! http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9758
author: dwaugh2
